index.title: About
index.textAbout: I am a front-end developer with experience in maintaining and creating high-fidelity pages, always using the most robust frameworks in the market for testing and development. Additionally, I have experience in customer support.
index.textAbout2: I started my career as a Junior Front-End Developer at Convertize, where I used HTML5, CSS3, Django, and Bootstrap to develop and maintain e-commerce pages. I also worked closely with the Support Analyst team, providing phone support and Helpdesk assistance via chat.
index.textAbout3: As I progressed in my career, I took on the role of Mid-level Front-End Developer at Convertize. In this role, I was responsible for creating custom landing pages and stores for clients, using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Django, jQuery, Bootstrap, and React.js. I also led the support and resolution of specific Front-End-related issues.
index.textAbout4: Most recently, I joined the development team at Cardano Warriors as a Software Engineer (front-end). In the project, I focused on creating highly responsive micro-frontends, following the guidelines set by the UX Designer at Cardano Warriors, using ViteJS, Vue 3, TypeScript, Sass, and VueI18N. Additionally, I actively participated in the creation of our UI library (ui-kit) to consolidate all components and business rules.
index.textAbout5: I am constantly seeking to improve my technical skills and stay up-to-date with the latest trends in front-end development. I am passionate about creating attractive interfaces, providing efficient solutions, and contributing to the success of the projects I am involved in.
index.textAbout6: I am open to challenging new opportunities where I can apply my experience and knowledge to drive team and company growth.
index.textAbout7: Please feel free to contact me to discuss how I can contribute to the success of your organization.
